name: WordPress Activity-o-meter
author: Micro Formatica

sections.description:
WordPress Activity-o-meter gives you, the administrator some insight in what you and your colleagues are doing within the local wordpress installation

Arbitrary section
sections.installation: Download and untar the tarball in the wp-content/plugins dir.
sections.faq:
Where can I see a working example of this?

Here: http://www.catholica.nl/jaargangen (live website)
sections.changelog:
1.2

  • Introduces [magazine-edition-control] shortcode. No more hacking requred to enable the public part of Magazine Edition Control.

1.1

  • Some minor changes.

1.0

  • Initial release
